summary: Add to the "powerful" melody of SP music for SKYRIM Music
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]
[b]=INTRODUCTION=[/b]

This mod replaces the music of [b]Skyrim Warriors [/b]becomes music [b]Skyrim Fighter[/b]
This mod was written on "Music Personalized - Without Vanilla Music"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13286/?

Replace some of the more powerful features for the Skyrim game to my liking
Add to the "strong" tune of SP music for SKYRIM Music.

[youtube]CfAhCc3l1hM[/youtube]

[b]= MOD DESCRIPTION =[/b]

The song list is still a lot of free space so you can add your favorite songs
Large amounts of music taken from DragonBallMusic are ignored

[b]= INSTALLATION =[/b]

Normal installation With Nexus Mod Manager or extract all files and copi to Data / music

[b]= VERSION =[/b]

Current version [b]1.2[/b]
New music added
[b]Blackreach[/b] is fixed
[b]Player Homes[/b] is changed

[b]= CREDITS =[/b]

Contribute your opinion if you like ..
Play fun and thanks for watching :)

[/size][/center]
author: Nguyen Yui Kido

files.name: 2. SKYRIM New Music SPX- Opening 2 v1.2
